short_description: sunflower medical is a medical supply manufacturer based in bradford, united kingdom.
long_description: uk's leading manufacturer of healthcare furniture. that's what makes a sunflower product and why our warranty and service is a real promise. based in bradford, west yorkshire we are proud of our uk manufacturing facility which undertakes its design, manufacturing, assembly and distribution all from one central site. having the ability to design new innovative products, manufacture and supply them from start to finish allows us to provide bespoke solutions and outstanding levels of service. we manufacture on site and in the uk. our latest product the neptune seating module offers a contemporary range of seating modules and chairs. we manufacture on site and in the uk and provide a 5 year warranty*. trusted by britain's leading healthcare & private companies. we're proud to provide furniture & medical solutions for some of britain's leading healthcare providers and major companies in the uk and abroad. through innovative design, continuous development and by utilising modern materials we provide a user friendly, product range, which is functional, stylish and aesthetically pleasing, constantly one step ahead, creating and designing the ideas of tomorrow.

generated_description: active underfloor, legally known as active energy uk ltd., is a leading manufacturer of healthcare furniture based in bradford, west yorkshire, united kingdom. the company specializes in designing, manufacturing, assembling, and distributing healthcare furniture from a single central site. utilizing advanced cnc, machining, drilling, spraying, and pressing facilities, active energy uk ltd. is capable of producing a wide range of products, including examination and treatment couches, chairs, medical trolleys, storage solutions, and patient privacy screens. the company emphasizes innovative design, continuous development, and the use of high-quality materials to create functional, stylish, and aesthetically pleasing products. their offerings are designed with cleanliness in mind, ensuring minimal dirt and bacteria traps, and are supplied with detailed cleaning guidelines. active energy uk ltd. serves various sectors, including hospitals, pharmacies, and veterinary clinics, providing bespoke solutions and exceptional service.
